name: Grid Paint
description: Free-to-use custom programmed grid paint tool. Paint as freely as the grid allows it.

name: Handy Arrows
description: A collection of hand-drawn arrows, doodles, and infographic elements for your next project.

name: Grainient.supply
description: Grainient offers 1000+ awesome gradients, noisy textured, and AI-generated backgrounds. Subscribe for unlimited downloads and elevate your designs with our premium collection.

name: Durves
description: A tool for creating and exporting dot patterns for graphic designers, UI/UX, and other visual professionals.

name: TextBehindImage
description: Create stunning text-behind-photo designs instantly with our free online tool. Add text behind images easily - no signup required. Automatic background removal.

name: Open Source SVG Loading Icons
description: Collection of 100+ Open Source SVG-based icons you can use to show content is being loaded. Absolutely free with no attribution required.

name: Penpot
description: Penpot is the open-source free design software that connects designers and developers with no handoff drama. Prototyping, UI design and code - all in one app.

name: Texturelabs
description: Texturelabs is an online resource for free, original textures and tutorials for art and design.
